title: Tribe model with relationships
description: Implement `app/models/tribe.py` with Tribe, TribeMember, and TribeOpenRole models. Tribe columns: id, owner_id (FK to users.id CASCADE indexed), name (String(100)), mission (Text nullable), status (Enum(TribeStatus) default OPEN), max_members (Integer default 8), search_vector (TSVECTOR with GIN index), created_at, updated_at. TribeMember junction: tribe_id + user_id composite PK, role (Enum(MemberRole) default MEMBER), status (Enum(MemberStatus) default PENDING), joined_at (nullable), requested_at. TribeOpenRole: id, tribe_id (FK cascade indexed), title (String(100)), skills_needed (JSONB default []), filled (Boolean default False), filled_by (FK to users.id nullable). Relationships: owner (User), members (many-to-many via tribe_members), open_roles (one-to-many).
acceptance_criteria:
- Tribe model with all columns
- TribeMember association table with composite PK
- TribeOpenRole model with FK to Tribe and User
- search_vector has GIN index
- All relationships defined
- All defaults match spec
- owner_id and tribe_id have cascade
